MANS PRAYER

Lord before i lay down to sleep today
I pray for a woman who's partially gay
One whos pretty sexy and bright
One whos fanny is small and tight
Oh send me a woman who goes like a train
Who swallows load and wants it again
And as she prays with this in mind
She will ask me to take her from behind
And when im done ill climb off and thank her
But untill you can find her .........

ill just be a wanker !!!!!!

mikey mikey !!!

You're the train inside my tunnel
You're the finger in my glove
You're the gear stick in my gearbox
My god this must be love

In my engine you're the piston
You're the toothpaste in my tube
The zucchini in my fettuccini
Oh I'm so in love with you

You're the rat inside my drainpipe
You're the log that burns my fire
The banana in my smoothie
Yes it's you that I desire

You're the bottle in my cooler
The plunger in my loo
Your torpedo fills my submarine
Yes my darling I love you

You are my phallic lover
We are a perfect fit
I'd like to do some things with you
If you'd be up to it?

So take me back to your place
And we can have some fun
It feels just right to hold you tight
As we two become as one.

The "KNOWS" of Autism,ADHD ..oh the list is endl

You KNOW that when.....

you hear a door close .. you aint going to like what happening on the other side !

you hear the toilet flush .. you,ve lost something that they should'nt of had!

you buy a bulk pack of loo rolls it was false economy!

you hear that sreech, you know the one thats ear piercing? you are going to be in A & E for most of the day

there is an unearthly slience, they must be miles away!

The phone rings at school time , your in trouble!

they ask for a specific thing for tea, they meant the other !

the cats wearing your underwear, your wardrobes emptied on the floor

you loose something , forget it you'll never ever find it !

Once you've sorted upstairs, you'll be back up there within 10 mins doing it again !

And sometimes you just wish that someone had come up with roll on aerosols and invisable talc!

But you also know that when at the end of the day you get that really hard squeeze and wet kiss that they really do mean it

awww how sweet

-------------------Girls-----------------------
--------------are like apples----------------
---------on trees. The best ones-----------
--------are at the top of the tree.----------
------The boys dont want to reach--------
----for the good ones because they-------
--are afraid of falling and getting hurt.----
-Instead, they just get the rotten apples--
---from the ground that aren't as good, --
-but easy. So the apples at the top think-
-something is wrong with them, when in--
----reality, they're amazing. They just----
-----have to wait for the right boy to------
-------come along, the one who's---------
-------------brave enough to---------------
------------------climb all-------------------
------------------ the way-------------------
------------------to the top------------------
-----------------of the tree.-----------------

WILL YOU LOT BEHAVE ??

This last week or so all ive seen is bickering amongst ex's !! seriously cannot see what you've got to gain ?

Just a quick back track as its not something i really want to post everywhere;
I had known my ex since the age of 7, got together at 21, moved in had a child ect ect
after 12 years and me being 6 months pregnant he strayed END OF !! GONE .

No fighting no bickering no nothing on my behalf, i had a unborn child to think of,it took alot of blood swet and tears to get her .

Grief from his side but not going into that....

anyways to the ones im reading about on here and you know who you are ? condem me , give me shit you know il forgive and still listen.

WHY ?? all you are doing is hurting, its done theres no going back it will always be there, so why keep it going ??

seriously sweetpea's close the book and start to write a fresh one ...
i dont like to see you all hurting xxxxxxxx

Anno its a bitter pill to swallow and leaves a crap aftertaste but theres plenty more delicacys out there and some do taste good
Steph x

FOOK IT I OUGHT TO BE WORKING FOR RELATE

LOONS !!!

What is it with some of the women on this site ?
im on a guys fiends list ,im on a few mens friends list dont mean nothing !
yet you get a woman scorned and she'll take it out on every woman on that list !!

were not all after cyber, some of us do genuinely have friends on here , who we meet for a laff and a chat .

And if yer happily married what the hell are you doing in web cam with another guy with yer hands down yer knickers ???????

monogamy rules lol x

and if i dissapear its cos ive been reported and i was such an

sme people just cant take the truth !!!!!!

DOORS

Life has may doors , some you open others you ignore, and then you close a few and others get locked and you throw away the key

deep mood today x

Just have a little read and a think

Think about this for a min......
If I happened to show up on your door step crying, would you
care?
If I called you and asked you to pick me up because something
happened, would you come?
If I had one day left, to live my life; would you be part of
that last day?
If I needed a shoulder to cry on, would you give me yours?

A friend sent me this the other day, kinda touched me , a friend ive never met but chat with alot on phone through text,email ect a friend who for the past year keep saying were going to meet but never quite there

Tonight that friend is in hospital fighting for his life, his chances are very slim , dont give out much hope he will make the weekend ........

Lifes too short for silly bickering, get out there and grab the bull by the horns
dont do what i feel i have and miss out on

wish i could turn back time .........

my blog ?????

um well i been told to spill so here goes> > >

ive been dormant for a few years lost all identity BUT im back and god help anyone who's path i cross !! im me again and thats a good thing

I love men cant do without em ! but when with one i am loyale i love to feed them and not just food

WHY STARVE A MAN ????
he'll only go else where for food and if you enjoy them keep going !!

oh and im an lol xxxxx

MY RELIABLE FRIEND

My Vibro, which brings me heaven,
Rabbit be thy name,
till kingdom come,
thy makes me cum,
on earth with eyes on heaven,
give me this, my daily thrill,
and forgive me my screams
as I forgive flat batteries,
lead me not into temptation,
but deliver me from frustration,
for thine is the rotation,
the power and the buzzing,
forever an ever....
NO MEN...!!

ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

mad mary was speeding around the mental ward as usual in her wheelchair
mad joe stopped her and asked for her licence
"sh**" she said and sped off around the corner
mad jim then stopped her and asked for insurance
"fu**" off she said and sped off around the corner
Rounding the corner she met BIG JOHN standing stark naked with a massive erections
"oh no"! she says "not the breathaliser again"

hmmm,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

sorry but this made me feckin laff

lol

Teacher asks pupil "which part of the body goes to heaven first" Pupil answers "feet miss,ive seen me mum with hers in the air SCREAMING OH GOD IM COMING !!
